english.segment1: Some people are driven by the wind. Some are driven by their madness. But I'm driven by the man. Who had nails driven in His hands
english.segment2: He's my source of light. That shines in my darkness. He's my source of living water. That I need every day. He's my sword and my shield. He's the fairest of ten thousand. He's the bright morning star. The soon coming king. The risen Lord
english.segment3: He will rise with healing in His wings. He will rise with healing in His wings. He will rise with healing in His wings
english.segment4: He's my source of light. That shines in my darkness. He's my source of living water. That I need every day. He's my sword and my shield. He's the fairest of ten thousand. He's the bright morning star. The soon coming king. The risen Lord
english.segment5: Some people are driven by the wind. Some are driven by their madness. But I'm driven by the man. Who had nails driven in His hands
